data.title: Whitworth University Athletics Programs
data.meta_description: What sports are offered at Whitworth University? Learn how each athletic ranks, how much revenue it brings in, the average sports aid per student athlete at Whitworth, and more.

Whitworth University Sports Information

$4,813,827 Total Revenue$4,391,300 Total Expenses21 Head Coaches

Before making a decision to attend Whitworth University, student athletes should take a look at the information presented here on the sports team they are interested in as well as the general athletics program.

Athletics OverviewBaseballCross CountryBasketballFootballGolfIndoor TrackLacrosseOutdoor TrackSoccerSoftballSwimmingTennisVolleyball

The Whitworth University Athletics Program

What Division Is Whitworth In?

Whitworth is in the Northwest Conference conference and faces off against other NCAA Division III with football schools.

Whitworth University Sports Participants

There are 566 athletes who take part in at least one sport at the school, 348 men and 218 women.

Whitworth University Coaches

The sports at Whitworth are led by 21 head coaches, 10 of whom coach male teams and 11 of whom spearhead womenâs teams. The head coaches of menâs teams make about $74,765 on average, and the yearly average salary of womenâs team head coaches is $71,943.

There are also 62 assitant coaches of sports at Whitworth. That breaks down to 34 assistant coaches of menâs teams and 28 assistant coaches of womenâs teams. The annual average salary for those who coach womenâs teams is $46,268 and the average for those who coach menâs is $49,045. Note, the individual salary of coaches is often dependent on the team they coach.

Did the Whitworth Athletics Program Make Money?

Whitworth sports teams made $4,813,827 in revenue, but they did have to spend $4,391,300 for expenses. In other words, the sports department made a profit of $422,527. Thatâs a whole lot better than taking a loss!

Likewise, money made for womenâs athletics can vary quite a bit by sport. Hereâs what the comparison looks like for womenâs sports at Whitworth.

A Note About Whitworth Sports Rankings

Below we give a summary of the data we have for each sport at Whitworth, including rankings when the school made it to one of our Best Schools for a Sport lists. The top spots on College Factualâs sports rankings are reserved for those schools that excel in both athletics and academics. This ensures that while youâre participating in sports programs at the school, youâll also be getting a solid education.
